info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 7:41PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN FULTON... EASTERN SCHENECTADY...NORTHERN FULTON...SOUTHERN HERKIMER...WESTERN SCHENECTADY...AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 741 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Middleville to Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction and moving east at 15 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Hagaman and Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction around 745 PM EST. Little Falls around 820 PM EST. Dolgeville and St. Johnsville around 830 PM EST. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 27 and 30. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
